marklogic.body:
Zimmerman claims that he had a broken nose, was Bleeding profusely.
Zimmerman claims that he was down with Martin on top pinning him down. Zimmerman claims that he shot Martin in the chest at point blank range while pinned beneath Martin.Â Â Zimmerman should be drenched in blood at the police station arrival, both his own and Martin's blood. No blood appears on Zimmerman's light blue pullover shirt, not from his own nose nor from Martin's blowback from point-blank range shooting within a foot from his shirt Poised down-gravity below the fatal wound.
Conclusion?...He is a liar!
